nodes.text: Nannat was a female Human, who lived on Thaere Privo during the time of the Clone Wars.

Nannat was the child of two soldiers in the Thaereian military and she was orphaned when they were killed in action. When she was 15, she was appointed to be the nanny of Night Forael Wren, the daughter of Senator Lavina Durada-Vashne Wren, who had been kidnapped by the Thaereian military. Nannat cared for her for a year and during that time, she came to care very much for Night and almost considered her to be her little sister.
